alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:48PM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Douglas County through 830 PM CST... At 747 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Centropolis, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Lawrence, Baldwin City, Eudora, Pleasant Grove and Vinland. This includes Kansas Turnpike near mile marker 205. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
